name: Interface ForOfLoopTree
text:
A tree node for for..of statement.

 For example:
 
   for ( variable of expression )
       statement
codes:
@Deprecated(since="11",
            forRemoval=true)
public interface ForOfLoopTree
extends LoopTree

methods.description: The for..of left hand side expression.
The object or array being whose properties are iterated.
The statement contained in this for..of statement.
